title: 服务器有拔刀MOD经常崩服请问怎么解决
author: 苹果大陆
txt_content:
换过好几次机器了 听说拔刀会因为区块爆炸请问怎么解决跪求







1.log


2019-7-9 00:11 上传
点击文件名下载附件




27.24 KB, 下载次数: 1












crash1-1.txt


2019-7-9 00:11 上传
点击文件名下载附件




8.89 KB, 下载次数: 2

replies.author: youqing123
replies.txt_content:
苹果大陆 发表于 2019-7-9 00:49
2个false 都改成true吗
对两个都改成true 这是强制吧错误实体删除。还有一种彻底解决的方法就是吧R87换成R77。拔刀1710服务器通病。如果解决了请设下最佳，如果没解决请继续追问。

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 苹果大陆
replies.txt_content:
世予 发表于 2019-7-9 00:22
forge.cfg发上来
服务端根目录的config文件夹里面
file:///C:/Users/%E8%91%AB%E8%8A%A6%E5%A8%83/Desktop/forge.cfg

replies.author: 苹果大陆
replies.txt_content:
世予 发表于 2019-7-9 00:22
forge.cfg发上来
服务端根目录的config文件夹里面
您看一看







forge.cfg


2019-7-9 00:44 上传
点击文件名下载附件




2.31 KB, 下载次数: 0

replies.author: youqing123
replies.txt_content:
打开你的服务端目录下的config/forge.cfg
    # Set this to true to remove any Entity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringEntities=false

    # Set this to true to remove any TileEntity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringTileEntities=false
将false改为true
可以解决因为实体和方块引起的蹦服or报错。

replies.author: 苹果大陆
replies.txt_content:
youqing123 发表于 2019-7-9 00:46
打开你的服务端目录下的config/forge.cfg
    # Set this to true to remove any Entity that throws an er ...
2个false 都改成true吗

replies.author: xxx小盆友
replies.txt_content:
打开你的服务端目录下的config/forge.cfg
    # Set this to true to remove any Entity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringEntities=false

    # Set this to true to remove any TileEntity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringTileEntities=false
将false改为true
可以解决因为实体和方块引起的蹦服or报错。


我服务器也是这样 解决方法是：如上修改后，拔刀本体版本换成r80以下版本，如果发现服务器启动不了，自己单机测试是哪个附属不支持换后的拔刀本体，求采纳，如有疑问继续追问，我服务器已经解决了

请问有拔刀老版本下载地址吗 修改后玩家有时候频繁掉线提示A fatal error。。。。。 ...
我的世界百科搜索拔刀剑 找到下载后 下载r80后的版本 装进服务器 当然客户端也要换，我服务器当时搞了足足2天 崩溃6次 回档4次 删除区块4次 然后才解决这个（疯狂暗示）
